label: Dance Classes and Lessons
description: Classes and lessons for various types of dance, including ballroom, tango, tap, ballet, and more.

subcategories.label: Ballroom Dancing
subcategories.description: Partner dancing in a ballroom setting, including waltz, foxtrot, and quickstep.

subcategories.label: Latin Dancing
subcategories.description: Partner dancing with a focus on Latin American styles, including salsa, bachata, and tango.

subcategories.label: Tap Dancing
subcategories.description: Dancing that emphasizes the sounds of tap shoes hitting the floor.

subcategories.label: Ballet
subcategories.description: A classical dance form characterized by grace and precision of movement.

subcategories.label: Jazz Dancing
subcategories.description: A high-energy dance form that incorporates elements of ballet and modern dance.
